channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Auto-Unapprove Plugin (for Bitbucket Server)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Auto-Unapprove Plugin (for Bitbucket Server)

item.title: CVE-2017-16857|2024-09-17T02:01:17.347Z -- atlassian -- auto-unapprove%20plugin%20%28for%20bitbucket%20server%29
item.description: It is possible to bypass the bitbucket auto-unapprove plugin via minimal brute-force because it is relying on asynchronous events on the back-end. This allows an attacker to merge any code into unsuspecting repositories. This affects all versions of the auto-unapprove plugin, however since the auto-unapprove plugin is not bundled with Bitbucket Server it does not affect any particular version of Bitbucket.
